explains: n. 竞争对手，敌手；可与之匹敌者，可与之相比的人（或物）
wordGroup: rival firms 竞争公司；竞争商行

sentences.en: She pipped her rival for the gold medal.
This year the newspaper has outsold its main rival.
sentences.cn: 今年该报的发行量已超过了它的主要对手。

sentences.en: Their smaller rival is battling to end their duopoly.
sentences.cn: 比他们小的竞争对手正在为结束他们两家寡头集团而斗争。
